channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: With 2 things :) First of all, which is most important, i would like to know how to change so that people cant mass kill other people or npc's. And 2nd i'd need to know how i change the hp on a npc. I am new to these things.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 09:45:56 AM[/size][hr]ANyone?

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:4, topic:104015”]Hmmmm did u check the tutorial list?
look here it is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,128018.0.html[/quote]
I did, and nothing helps, i dont wanna jail the massers, i want to stop massing completely when pking !

Read full topic
